00021 #ifndef _CDFProbeSetInformation_HEADER_
00022 #define _CDFProbeSetInformation_HEADER_
00023 
00024 /*! \file CDFProbeSetInformation.h This file defines the CDFProbeSetInformation class.
00025  */
00026 
00027 #ifdef _MSC_VER
00028 #include <windows.h>
00029 #endif
00030 
00031 #include "calvin_files/data/src/CDFDataTypes.h"
00032 #include "calvin_files/data/src/DataGroup.h"
00033 #include "calvin_files/portability/src/AffymetrixBaseTypes.h"
00034 //
00035 
00036 
00037 namespace affymetrix_calvin_io
00038 {
00039 
00040 class CDFProbeGroupInformation;
00041 
00042 /*! Class that exposes the CDF probe set information */
00043 class CDFProbeSetInformation
00044 {
00045 public:
00046         /*! Constructor */
00047         CDFProbeSetInformation();
00048         /*! Destructor */
00049         ~CDFProbeSetInformation();
00050 
00051         /*! Get the probe set name */
00052         std::wstring GetName() const { if (dataGroup) return dataGroup->Header().GetName(); else return L""; }
00053         /*! Get the probe set direction */
00054         affymetrix_calvin_io::DirectionType GetDirection() const { return (affymetrix_calvin_io::DirectionType)direction; }
00055         /*! Get the total number of lists (atoms) in the probe set */
00056         u_int32_t GetNumLists() const { return listCnt; }
00057         /*! Get the number of groups (block) in the probe set */
00058         u_int32_t GetNumGroups() const { return groupCnt; }
00059         /*! Get the total number of cells in the probe set */
00060         u_int32_t GetNumCells() const { return cellCnt; }
00061         /*! Get the number of cells per list (atom) */
00062         u_int8_t GetNumCellsPerList() const { return (u_int8_t)cellsPerList; }
00063         /*! Get the probe set number */
00064         u_int32_t GetProbeSetNumber() const { return probeSetNumber; }
00065         /*! Get information for a probe set group by index */
00066         void GetGroupInformation(u_int32_t groupIdx, CDFProbeGroupInformation & info);
00067         /*! Get the probe set type. */
00068         CDFDataTypeIds GetProbeSetType() const { return (CDFDataTypeIds)type; }
00069 
00070 protected:
00071         /*!  */
00072         void SetDataGroup(DataGroup& dg);
00073 
00074 protected:
00075         /*! DataGroup */
00076         DataGroup* dataGroup;
00077 
00078         /*! Probe set type - based on unitType of first DataSet u_int8_t*/
00079         CDFDataTypeIds type;
00080         /*! Direction - based on first DataSet */
00081         u_int8_t direction;
00082         /*! Total number of groups (blocks), = number of DataSets in the DataGroup */
00083         u_int32_t groupCnt;
00084         /*! Total number of lists (atoms) in the probe set - sum of all DataSets */
00085         u_int32_t listCnt;
00086         /*! Total number of cells in the probe set - sum of all DataSets */
00087         u_int32_t cellCnt;
00088         /*! Probe set number - based on value in first DataSet, same as ProbeSetNumber in C++ */
00089         u_int32_t probeSetNumber;
00090         /*! Cells per list (Cell per atom) - based on value in the first DataSet, same as NumCellsPerList in C++ */
00091         u_int8_t cellsPerList;
00092 
00093         friend class CDFData;
00094 };
00095 
00096 }
00097 #endif  // _CDFProbeSetInformation_HEADER_
